title: NewCryptocasinos
author: NewCryptocasinos
content: Casinos are struggling to find an edge against others, They try to improve their bonuses, loyalty programs and new games. I have an idea how they can scale up their business in a fun way for their costumers. I would like to know what you think about it.Community Casino TournamentsCasino “X” setup a tournament for ( Ex Babydoge ) could be $ADA $SHIB etcCasino X add 5k in value in the “babydoge” token as a prize of this tournamentThe tournament buy in, will be in “Babydoge” The tournament winner will be the player with the highest score after 7 days and the winner can collect the 5k in Babydoge. So why is this good?If the casino can interact with other communities in a natural way - Hey Guys, come and play this tournament with your favorite token The casino can now  scale up its business through other communitiesThe Casino can probably also get free advertising from the admins in that specific community telegram or discord, if they let them know they will have a big “babydoge” tournament. This event is a win/win for all parties, The Casino will get more players into their casino and the community token gets more new holders from the casino that want to participate in this tournament, and need to buy the token before they can.Obviously, this will requires multiple crypto payments options, so a "babydoge" holder can deposit in "Babydoge" I think this would be a good way for the casino to scale up, and fun for the players.
